description.displayText: Melanie is an absolutely wonderful cleaner/nanny. She has been with my family for about a year now and it has been amazing!! My 4 year old daughter absolutely loves her! She plays with her, does her hair and loves to help her learn new things. I work long hours quite often and my home is always clean and organized and my daughter is fed and ready for bed. Sometimes, when I'm late, she'll even read her a bedtime story and put her to bed. She's always pleasant and eager to help. We love having her with us.
description.originalText: Melanie is an absolutely wonderful cleaner/nanny. She has been with my family for about a year now and it has been amazing!! My 4 year old daughter absolutely loves her!
